revolution.headline: Onoff?
revolution.description: I love working on products that simplify everyday life through smart design. Onoff’s mission to reinvent mobile communication is something I believe in — and I’d love to help shape its future.

whatIBringTitle: What I Bring to the Table

traits.title: Attention to Detail
traits.text: Even when my former colleagues insisted that a few millimeters didn’t matter, I couldn’t help but make sure everything was spot-on—even if it meant going the extra millimeter.

traits.title: Persistence
traits.text: I once started an intricate origami piece and spent 10 hours straight working on it because I couldn't stop until it was perfectly finished.

traits.title: Problem-Solving
traits.text: In my role as a construction supervisor, I often had to improvise by tweaking designs or finding alternative materials when plans changed unexpectedly.

traits.title: Continuous Growth
traits.text: After mastering the challenges in my previous career, I found myself seeking new horizons where I could continue to learn and evolve. This led me to front-end development.

traits.title: Teamwork
traits.text: My experience as a construction supervisor taught me the value of teamwork by coordinating closely with designers, laborers, and suppliers to ensure successful project outcomes.

projects.title: Latest Projects
projects.intro: From a React-based Typing Game and a Loan Decision Engine built with Spring Boot to a full-featured Flight Planner App — I’ve been crafting full-stack tools that solve real problems and deliver clean user experiences.

personalNote.title: Life beyond the screen?
personalNote.description: When I'm not coding, you'll likely find me outdoors—playing disc golf, cycling, running or doing something sporty. I also enjoy board games and spending time with my dog.
